jobTitle: Data Science Professional, Assistant Vice President
jobDescription: Support the consultative relationships with key business stakeholders, proactively identifying data analytics needs to meet business, regulatory, and compliance requirements  Support the delivery of data analytics solutions from start to finish, including data preparation (e.g., source, scrub, mine and integrate relevant data sources) and relevant data science work streams  Support proof of concept projects to test and adopt emerging data analytics tools and methods  Support the conversion of ideas and business needs into meaningful data analytics work along with data requirements  Support the development of a standard process on defining data requirements, managing governance, creating data analytics solutions for use throughout the organization  Support the identification of new approaches to complex design problems related to data science work products  Qualifications  Bachelor’s Degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Operations Research, Data Science, and Computer Science or in “STEM” Majors (Science, Technology, Engineering and Math).
